Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show two students trying to communicate over a long distance using the string telephone.
The student can include details that demonstrate the string telephone's ability to send or receive information using sound.
The student can demonstrate that the device is designed using only the materials provided, like cups and string.
The student can depict the role of technology in helping people communicate over distances.
The student can illustrate the scientific concept of sound traveling through the string as part of the device's operation.
